txt.en: 'Well look at you. You survived! And with a sack of ore for me to examine? Ahh, may your beard grow thick and lush. Give it here then!'

'Stop! Do not go that way, lest you fancy fighting the very trees themselves. I am Alêtifa, and I am come north, following hints that a previously unknown ore was to be found in the rocks about the waterfall at the top of this stream.\n\n'Little did I know, wood-trolls infest these parts. I haven't been able to get any closer, but you look like someone who might be able to. I shall reward you if you clear out some of those overgrown weeds and bring me back what ore you might find.'
Among the rocks that line the banks of a crashing waterfall, a strange ore has been discovered. Getting to it, however, will take some skill.

You should let Alêtifa know that you have cleared some of the wood-trolls out of the area and bring her the ore you gathered.\n\nAlêtifa is waiting by the banks of the Hathollant, in north-western Pinnath Gelin.
'Stop! Do not go that way, lest you fancy fighting the very trees themselves.'
